Package demolition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    The App class implements the methods for setting up and drawing the game and handling player input.
    Bomb
    The Bomb class is used to store information and handle functions related to particular bomb entities.
    Character
    This abstract class is used for functions relevant to all entities that can move in four directions, described as Characters.
    Coordinates
    A helper class for storing coordinates.
    Entity
    This abstract class is used to store and handle functions common to all entities.
    Explosion
    This is used to handle functions relevant to a particular explosion.
    GameState
    A helper class used to store and handle all data and functions relevant to handling the current state of the game.
    GraphicsHandler
    A helper class for handling graphics.
    KeyHandler
    A helper class for handling keyboard input by the player.
    Player
    Stores all information and handles all functions relevant to a particular instance of the Player.
    RedEnemy
    Handles all information and functionality relevant to a single Red Enemy.
    Setup
    A helper class for setting up the game, including loading images and the config file.
    YellowEnemy
    Handles all information and functionality relevant to a single Yellow Enemy.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    This enum is used to represent the seven directions relevant to various entities in this game.
    Tile
    An enumerator used to represent each of the four tile types.
